# SELTA Projects — llms.txt
# https://llmstxt.org

# About
SELTA Projects is a topography and new build project management company
operating in Lisbon, Cascais and Setúbal, Portugal.

The business originated as a topography firm. Topographic surveys are carried out
in-house with precision equipment. Architecture, design and construction are
coordinated end to end for clients who need a full service.

# Services
- Topographic Survey (in-house): Planimetric and altimetric surveys, project setting out,
  boundary marking, and permitting drawings for licensing
- Design & Permitting Coordination: Managing architects, engineers and specialists through
  the licensing process at the local council (câmara municipal)
- Construction Management: Selection and management of vetted contractors, site visits,
  timeline and cost control
- Handover & Close: Final inspections, habitation licence (licença de utilização), full documentation

# Locations
- Cascais (primary)
- Sintra
- Lisbon city
- Setúbal
- Arrábida
